name: Ashley Moll
text: The pizza was delicious (not surprised because of the great reviews) but the salad was one of the freshest salads I've ever had! We were very pleased with our food!

name: Tamar Hovsepian
text: Amazing food, even better service. Lana was my server for the night and took great care of our party. Perfect for a casual night out.

name: Dawn Lawrence
text: We came in and ordered a pizza and wings. When the pizza was brought out they informed us there was a hole in the dough and that another pizza was in the oven for us to take home to make up for the other pizza. Never in my whole life has any other establishment went this far and beyond to make sure we were happy with our food.

name: Karen McGuire
text: Picked up a large order for a socially distanced wedding reception. The food was awesome as always and they brought it out to the car. Always pleased with Anthony's!

name: Kim Davis
text: We were not impressed. The pizza was very good, but from the time we arrived, the service & environment was not good. When we arrived there was not any space for us to wait for a table as they had large umbrella stored and a bistro table in …More

name: Heather
text: This is by far some of the best pizza that I've come across. We wanted to try some other pizza places that were local but just couldn't bring ourselves to stray. I also appreciate the ease of ordering online. Love Love Love this place!

name: Linda Tourdot
text: Good food but limited menu. Nice place for Girls night out or mid-week date

name: Dawn Kovach
text: Way to much for the food, menu said hot peppers, was mild peppers.  Charged extra for salad vs. giving the included deal.

name: MICHAEL MANTEY
text: VERY courteous staff. Very generous military discount. I've enjoyed everything I've ever eaten from here. Awesome meatballs and margharita pizza in particular. Thanks Anthony's!

name: Bob Cahill
text: Hey, are you familiar with Italian culture? Well, let me remind you. We eat. We eat allot. I ordered your "family style" chicken parm last night. 3 pieces of over-cooked chicken and some potatoes that were haphazardly arranged on a separate …More

name: E KJ
text: Anthony’s has very tasty, fresh food. Love the meatballs, pizza, salad and cheesecake. Also one of the best Long Island Iced Teas! If you’ve never tried Anthony’s, you should. If you stopped going because they went through a rough patch …More

name: Shawn Mcguire
text: Yesterday was our first time in this place. But It is surely not the last time. We passed a splendid evening with the efficient service, with the exceptional cooking and booze and with the honest price. We will definitely come back in a short time.

name: Steve Klein
text: The eggplant marino pizza is superb

name: John Strouse
text:
Best pizza. Crust exceptional. Service gr8. Eggplant app fabulous.
Mngr.Kyle is the man. Thank u.

name: Desirae Johnson
text: Good pizza, fast service.

name: mike rossi
text: When we walk in we are treated like family.  My wife was on crutches and the manager brought a chair over for her to sit in while we waited for a table.  Nice people, chill atmosphere and AMAZING food! It's a win win win

name: Bonnie Hyman
text:
Amazing wings here! You will love the flavoring and a bonus that they are grilled and not fried.
You can actually taste all the spices and enough fried onions on top makes them …More

name: Jaclyn Russo
text: The have amazing meatballs, pizza and wings. The service is great everytime I go. I enjoy the atmosphere

name: Marc Hutchinson
text: Service is not good. I’m not sure if the people working there are that bad or they are not being taught customer service. Walked in to pick up an order close to closing. Server was helping the last 2 people in the restaurant so I waited …More

name: J
text: We've been here several times. Think it was better when it first opened. The pepperoni pizza is good, greasy but good. The margarita is lacking. The tomato sauce needed seasoning, and there were only 2 springs of basil and you need leaves of basil all over to make it a margarita. The cocktails are weak so order wine or beer.

name: Danielle Nebesni
text: Just had another amazing dinner at Anthony’s. The service and food were great. I’m impressed with how friendly the staff is. Can’t wait to come back again.

name: Josh Cafarella
text: The pizza is good. The service is terrible and very slow. Have ordered take out 2x and had to wait 20 min or more past the initially communicated wait time. This is a problem. I won’t go back to this location anymore.

name: Aria Hillhouse
text: Love their pizza and wings.

name: David K
text: Pizza is always good here. I really like how different tasting it is compared to traditional pizza places.  The service is always quick and on point.  They also have giant glass windows/doors that open during warm weather to the inside room which is awesome.  If you want to sit at a bar or table either way you will enjoy your time here.

name: Anu Patel
text: Some of the best pizza around. It's got that nice crunch to the crust and the sauce and cheese pair well.

name: Christina Marin
text: I ordered Anthony's Coal fired pizza at the Blue Bell, PA location on a Thursday night for pick up. When I got home, I saw that the pizza was completely burnt and they gave me the wrong toppings.  I ordered long hot peppers with pepperoni …More

name: Sarah Marie
text: Pretty good pizza- and the bar is nice as well. I highly recommend the calzones- fantastic. The only reason it's a 4 star review is due to the fact that they messed up my calzone order and made me a small one vs. the family size for my fiance and I to share.

name: Nichole Beall
text: My absolute favorite pizza place in blue bell. They are always so good with my son too, who can be wild at times. He loves coming here too since everyone is so playful and sweet to him. The Arugula pizza is to die for, I get it every time I go here.

name: Meredith R
text: We can't drive past without my 2 year old (& husband) asking for meatballs and pizza!  I love the arugala salad!  Chocolate cake is good too!

name: Brinda Zipperer
text: Omg!!! The meatballs are to die for. I finally broke down and bought a pot.  Taste just as great as eating in. The staff is friendly and the manager Keith stops at every table to make sure you enjoyed your food and having a good time. It’s …More

name: Michael Weber
text: Haven't ate yet. Waiting an hour. Under staffed. No one at the door to seat you. They have beer. That's why they get two stars. Can't comment on the pizza because I'm not sure if it will ever come...

name: Penny Croak
text: Rude staff and tasteless food.

name: Rhonda Davis
text: The wings and pizza are AMAZING

name: Angela Oliver
text: Great pizza and salad ! Karena at the take out counter is efficient, very professional, and always has my order ready in a timely manner !

name: Mark Mccarter
text: great pizza good. beer

name: John Mattern
text: Was expecting some great, coal fired pizza but was surprised when the server brought it out.  Very little "coal fired" taste not to mention bland pizza in general.  Server was great, however, we should have realized it wasn't going to be impressive with no wait for seating on a Saturday night...

name: Leslie Kelly
text: Horrible service It took well over an hour to get our food and it was cold and our server Seemed to be oblivious to the situation. We will not be back

name: Sutthikan Tunsueb
text: worst wings i've ever had. pizza was ok but way over priced. hard pass..

name: Peter Labick
text: Addicting pizza. Really, wants you try the amazing, thin crust pizza with juicy cheese and mout water sauce, all other pizza is absolutely ruined. There is no restaurant in the area that even comes close to the quality, taste, and consistency of Anthony's.

name: yasmina alhashimi
text: for me it’s one of the best pizza in Philadelphia ( this was my review before 8 months) + 4stars …More

name: Kevin Shane
text: The food was good, but service was not spot on. The pizza took way to long and they forgot one dish. I thought they might have some full entrees, but only small plates and pizza.

name: Devin Concannon
text: The pizza is always good but I always end up waiting another 20 minutes after they say it's ready.

name: Connie Schaffer
text: Nice! Hot the spot! Good cocktail. Food good except for the salad dressing that was too oily for me.

name: Steve Chan
text: Good pizza options to choose from along with other food options. Service was great and the space is nice and modern. TV and bar inside as well.

name: Fred Strozzieri
text: Very good thin crust pizza. The meatballs are a must. They're served in tomato sauce of course, and with a dolop of fresh ricotta. The arugula salad is also a must.

name: Tea Maker
text: My new favorite pizza place the pizza is very crispy and the arugula salad with burrata cheese is great.

name: Matthew Taylor
text: Another great meal at Anthony's. Wings and pizza are all AWESOME

name: Ajibola Rivers
text: This was my first time there, and I was impressed. Usually, I'm not crazy about eating pizza because it tends to be greasy, it feels heavy in my stomach, and I feel disgusting after eating it. This pizza, however, has a way of being …More

name: Lauren Ralston
text: I am a huge fan of this place! But today we ordered for my coworkers birthday and it was not very good.   Just average margherita pizza which I had before and loved.   I’ll be back just won’t have it delivered.   I used DoorDash and next time will pick up!

name: Catherine Merkle
text: I've visited 3 times. Each time I hope it will be better. Service is fair, and food is below average. Much better pizza elsewhere in the area.

name: Meredith Pileggi
text: Quite possibly the best pizza around and the staff was amazing. Any place that takes a special interest in my kids is a winner to me. Ashley was our server and was super attentive and helpful. The bartender (who's name I forget but she has …More

name: Ed T
text: The tradition pizza and wings are amazing! There is also bar seating so it’s a great place to grab a quick bite and a drink with friends. This is my favorite pizza place in the area, you won’t regret it.

name: Kathy Mangiola
text: Love the delicious pizza the warm atmosphere and the wine

name: Liam Geary
text: Awesome Food!!!!! 10 out of 10 WOULD RECOMMEND!!! AMAZING SERVICE AND VERY GOOD PRESENTATION!!! I will definitely be back in the future!! Thank You for making my Night!!!!

text: Great service and excellent food.  The arugula salad was amazing!

text: Great pizza my favorite is meatballs and long hot peppers the spaghetti is awesome too

name: Ken Wollman
text: Was back in recently, they honored the free pizza that was offered because of my last visit.  I love the pizza and wings here.  I will be back.  From 1 star to now 4 stars. …More

name: Karen Walla
text: I really like Anthony's, their pizza's really pretty good and their wings are awesome. I'd call their pizza kind of gourmet with a thin crust, slightly burnt. Can get busy at Prime Times, but you won't be disappointed with the food. They …More

name: Morphs 50
text: Ate here for dinner on Friday night. Service was fantastic. The wings were so delicious, I loved the char and crunch on the skin from baking them in the coal fire oven. The pizza was fantastic. One of my family's new favorite places.

name: Bryan Seidel
text: Awesome wings, good open space with good servers. Def my new spot

name: J Harris
text: Anthony's Coal Fire always has great food. 3 stars for this particular restaurant. As you can see when you Google this restaurant you can reserve a table. When you call the say they don't really reserve tables. If you walk in give your name …More

text: I love Anthony's pizza! The meatball is my favorite.

text: Food and service were great. Fun atmosphere. Noise level fairly high but most people expect that these days.

name: Jim McMonagle
text: I have always had a great experience with this restaurant. I’m happy to give them a great review.

text: Never again will I order a takeout margherita pizza.  For $21.00 I was expecting a good pizza . Instead I got cardboard flavorless pizza. I bet the box the pizza came in tasted better.   Terribly disappointed  is a understatement.
